Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 99th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1969...
Injured on 5/7/1975 with a Fractured Hip, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from New Jersey to Northeastern on 4/26/1976 (Going to NE: C W. Huggins. Going to NJ: P J. Plumlee)...
Had first career hit on 4/26/1976, off Ruby Thomas (DIA)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/4/1976, off Darrell Muldoon (Min)...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/19/1982 to a 2-year deal worth $300,001 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/8/1984 to a 2-year deal worth $450,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/3/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $560,000 per year...
